about_the_game:
A PILGRIMAGE TOWARD REPENTANCE

Take on the role of a Ward of Corvus and carve your way through the interconnected islands of the Risacca Archipelago to end the evil consuming this world. Face formidable enemies in epic battles and uncover countless secrets with every new sacrificial attempt.

EACH ATTEMPT IS UNIQUE

The Risacca Archipelago is ravaged by tides and corruption. Every run offers the opportunity to explore a new path leading to the ultimate sacrifice. Enemies, chests, and rewards awaiting you will vary with each attempt.

EVERY DECISION MATTERS

Beware, Ward! Every choice you make binds you to your fate. The path to the gate is fraught with traps and deadly encounters. Haste will be your downfall.

FORGE YOUR DESTINY

Gather and upgrade your weapons and equipment throughout your trials. Accept the blessings of the Embrace and wield its powers to amplify your abilities. Discover countless character builds and configurations as you progress.

A DARK FANTASTIC WORLD

Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy, set in breathtaking environments designed to make your journey as perilous as a voyage through hell itself.

name: Isles of Krom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX550
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Isles of Krom is a top-down action roguelike that combines the visceral and demanding combat of a Souls-like games with the deep character-building and progression systems of the best roguelikes.
